nodes.bodyText: Definitely from the previous version but I'm not sure why this test loops. The goal of the test seems to be to check that setting a rating updates the relevance of another question. In my head the test could just do this once: check the "Target13" question doesn't exist, set a (any) rating, check it does, remove the rating, check "Target13". @lognaturel can you think of any reason we might be checking every value here?
Yes, I too think you are right here @seadowg. Checking just once whether changing the rating makes changes to another question should suffice.
Probably good to check the view disappears once the answer is removed as well.
